articles.title: Big shortfall in hiring of ex-servicemen across govt depts, posts: Data
articles.description: Of the 10,84,705 Group C employees in the 34 Central government departments, only 13,976 were ex-servicemen. And of the total 3,25,265 Group D employees, only 8,642 were ex-servicemen.

articles.title: SpiceJet Officer Breaks Down What Happened On Flight After Engine Fire
articles.description: A bird hit the engine of the flight that made emergency landing in Patna today, damaging three of its fan blades, said a SpiceJet official as he shared details of what happened when one of its engines caught fire.
articles.content:
The Delhi-bound SpiceJet flight made an emergency landing today at Patna airport.
